attributes.additional_details:
We are aware of abandoned smouldering BBQ's being reported at Brockenhurst, Lyndhurst, Linford, Millyford Bridge, Balmer Lawn, Wilverley and Woodlands over the past 2 days. There are probably many more that we don't know about.

Disposable barbecues burn the ground, cannot be recycled or composted and are extremely un-environmentally-friendly.  Disposable barbecues give off carbon monoxide when being used and continue to do so until they are completely cold and as we know this is poisonous.
attributes.background: Ban and remove the sale of disposable BBQ’s
